description: Identify the year with the highest number of new vehicle registrations.
Determine the total number of new vehicle registrations in 2005.
Calculate the average number of new vehicle registrations from 2003 to 2019.
Are there any years where the number of new vehicle registrations significantly deviated from the general trend?
Identify if there is a general upward or downward trend in new vehicle registrations over the years.
Find the range of new vehicle registrations between 2003 and 2019.
Group the years into clusters based on similar numbers of new vehicle registrations.
What is the percentage of years with more than 380,000 new vehicle registrations?
Filter out the years where new vehicle registrations were below 370,000.
Arrange the years in ascending order based on the number of new vehicle registrations.
